data.name: Strange Loop
data.description: Strange Loop (Sept 12-14, 2019 - St. Louis) is a conference for software developers covering programming langs, databases, distributed systems, security, machine learning, creativity, and more!

relatedRecords.name: Girls In Tech Summit
relatedRecords.description: The Girls in Tech Summit is a celebration of TechGirlz’s 10th Anniversary with talks on technology given by girls, for girls.
